author: Suzannah Lyons And Amanda Smith
title: With gyms closed due to coronavirus, what are your safest exercise options?
description: Gyms are closed. Routines are changing. So how can you stay safe but also stay active as we're spending more time at home.
content:
The gyms are now closed.
They, and other indoor sporting venues, shut their doors midday local time on Monday, after the state and Federal governments' coronavirus shutdown.
So how can you stay safe AND active right now.
